name: Chunky
description:
Recomended to download PC build.

Chunky - it's a boss rush physics based game with roguelike elements, made for BossRushJam 2023, where you must make your weapon out of chunks and fight the boss with it. 

Every stage boss, and you as well, gain upgrades. Also at stage 4 and 8 boss gains new attacks.  

Main goal - complete as much stages as possible!
